item.title: 特朗普政府着手废除拜登时期关于独立承包商的规定
item.description: 特朗普政府周四着手废除一项长期遭商业团体反对的法规，该法规使企业更难将雇员归类为独立承包商——雇员身份将增加企业成本。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration on Thursday moved to scrap a rule long opposed by business groups for making it harder to classify workers as independent contractors rather than employees, who can cost a company more.】

item.title: 消息人士称先正达计划于第二季度在香港进行最高达100亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 知情人士向路透社透露，先正达集团计划在今年第二季度在香港进行最高达100亿美元的股票上市，并已聘请银行管理首次公开募股事宜。【原文：Syngenta Group plans to launch an up to $10 billion stock market listing in Hong Kong in the second quarter of this year and has hired banks to manage the initial public offering, two people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 希腊法院裁定四名涉窃听丑闻者因非法获取私人数据罪名成立
item.description: 希腊一家法院周四裁定，监控公司Intellexa的创始人及其他三名人员在2020至2021年间犯有侵犯个人数据罪，并判处其监禁。这起窃听丑闻自2022年起持续冲击希腊政坛，此次判决为该案再添新转折。【原文：A Greek court on Thursday concluded that the founder of surveillance firm Intellexa and three other people were guilty of breaching personal data in 2020-2021 and sentenced them to prison terms, in the latest twist of wiretapping scandal that has rocked Greece since 2022.】

item.title: 胜利资本以每股57美元的价格对Janus Henderson提出竞争性收购要约
item.description: 胜利资本周四宣布，已提出以每股57.04美元的价格收购同行Janus Henderson。此前数月，这家资产管理公司刚与尼尔森·佩尔茨的Trian基金及风险投资公司General Catalyst达成74亿美元的交易。【原文：Victory Capital said on Thursday it has offered to buy peer Janus Henderson for $57.04 per share, months after the asset manager unveiled a $7.4 billion deal with Nelson Peltz's Trian and VC firm General Catalyst.】

item.title: eBay裁员6% 电商企业重组业务布局
item.description: eBay周四宣布将裁减约800个岗位，占其全职员工总数的6%左右。这家电商公司此举旨在精简运营，使人员配置与战略重点保持一致。【原文：Ebay said on Thursday it is cutting about 800 jobs, or roughly 6% of its full‑time workforce, as the e‑commerce company moves to streamline operations and align staffing with its strategic priorities.】

item.title: 美国结束对740万辆Stellantis汽车的调查，未要求召回
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周四结束了针对克莱斯勒母公司Stellantis旗下近740万辆美国汽车的长期调查。该调查涉及主动式头枕意外弹出问题，但监管机构未要求召回。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration on Thursday closed a long-running probe into nearly 7.4 million U.S. vehicles built by Chrysler-parent Stellantis over inadvertent deployments of active head rests without seeking a recall.】

item.title: 独家报道：博通预计到2027年将售出100万片3D堆叠芯片
item.description: 博通公司周三向路透社透露，这家人工智能芯片设计商预计到2027年将售出至少100万枚基于其堆叠设计技术的芯片。【原文：Artificial intelligence chip designer Broadcom said that it expects to sell at least 1 million chips by 2027 based on its stacked design tech, an executive told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普提升退休储蓄的计划是什么？
item.description: 周二，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普在国情咨文演讲中宣布了一项计划，该计划有望帮助数千万美国人储蓄养老金，为那些无法通过雇主赞助的退休计划进行储蓄的人提供了一种途径。【原文：President Donald Trump on Tuesday used his State of the Union address to announce a program that could help tens of millions of Americans save for retirement, giving those without access to an employer-sponsored retirement plan a vehicle to do so.】

item.title: OpenAI将伦敦打造为其在美国以外最大的研发中心
item.description: ChatGPT开发商OpenAI周四宣布，将把伦敦打造为其在美国以外最大的研发中心。该公司表示，英国的技术生态系统为投资和开发新型人工智能系统提供了理想环境。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI said on Thursday that it would make London its largest research hub outside the United States, citing Britain's technology ecosystem as an ideal environment to invest in and develop new artificial intelligence systems.】

item.title: 美国每周初请失业金人数小幅上升，劳动力市场趋于稳定
item.description: 上周美国初请失业救济人数小幅上升，在劳动力市场保持稳定的背景下，2月份失业率似乎持平。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits increased marginally last week and the unemployment rate appeared to hold steady in February amid a stable labor market.】

item.title: 福特因软件问题召回430万辆美国汽车
item.description: 福特汽车周四宣布，将在美国召回430万辆皮卡和SUV，原因是软件故障可能导致刹车失灵和外部灯光故障。【原文：Ford Motor said Thursday it is recalling 4.3 million pickup trucks and SUVs in the United States because a software error may cause brakes not to function and exterior lights to fail.】

item.title: 诺瓦瓦克斯因疫苗交易强劲表现上调2026年调整后营收预期
item.description: 诺瓦瓦克斯公司周四上调了2026年调整后营收预期，因其预计疫苗供应及许可协议中的里程碑付款将抵消需求疲软带来的压力。【原文：Novavax raised its adjusted revenue forecast for 2026 on Thursday, as it expects milestone payments from vaccine supply and licensing deals to offset pressure from sagging demand.】

item.title: J.M. Smucker与Elliott达成协议，任命两名独立董事
item.description: J.M. Smucker公司周四宣布，在与投资者Elliott投资管理公司达成"建设性合作"后，已任命郑佑成和大卫·辛格加入其董事会。【原文：J.M. Smucker said on Thursday it had appointed Woo-Sung Chung and David Singer to its board, after reaching a "constructive engagement" with investor Elliott Investment Management.】

item.title: NextEra Energy将出售价值20亿美元的股权单位以资助能源项目
item.description: 能源公司NextEra Energy周四宣布，将公开发行价值20亿美元的股权单位，用于资助能源与电力项目的投资。【原文：Utility NextEra Energy said on Thursday it will conduct a public offering of $2 billion in equity units to fund investments in energy and power projects.】

item.title: 霍尔梅尔因零售需求疲软未达季度销售预期
item.description: 生产"斯基皮"牌花生酱的荷美尔食品公司周四公布的季度销售额低于预期，反映出在经济不确定性加剧的背景下，美国消费者正转向更廉价的替代品。【原文：Skippy peanut butter maker Hormel Foods missed quarterly sales estimates on Thursday, reflecting U.S. consumers' shift towards cheaper alternatives amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 特朗普兄弟支持的美国比特币公司因加密货币抛售潮陷入季度亏损
item.description: 由美国总统唐纳德·特朗普两名儿子支持的美国比特币公司周四公布，受数字资产领域疲软影响，该公司第四季度转为亏损。【原文：American Bitcoin , backed by two of U.S. President Donald Trump's sons, swung to a fourth-quarter loss on Thursday amid a weakness in the digital assets space.】

item.title: Equinix与加拿大CPPIB接近达成协议，将收购北欧数据中心运营商AtNorth，彭博社报道
item.description: 据彭博社周四报道，知情人士透露，Equinix与加拿大养老金计划投资委员会即将达成协议，收购由Partners Group支持的泛北欧数据中心运营商atNorth。【原文：Equinix and Canada Pension Plan Investment Board are close to reaching a deal to acquire atNorth, a pan-Nordic data-center operator backed by Partners Group, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：英伟达的哑火
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 凯雷集团计划到2028年筹集超过2000亿美元资金
item.description: 投资公司凯雷集团周四表示，预计在2028年前将筹集至少2000亿美元资金，增速将超过过去三年，并由此提升其资产管理收益。【原文：Investment firm Carlyle expects to raise at least $200 billion between now and 2028, a faster pace than the previous three years, and boost its earnings from managing that money, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟季度营收下滑6%，交易谈判成焦点
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司深陷高风险竞购战，其季度营收下滑6%，传统影视业务下滑拖累业绩，但HBO Max流媒体平台凭借《激烈竞争》等热门剧集吸引了更多订阅用户。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery , at the center of a high-stakes bidding war, reported a 6% drop in quarterly revenue, hurt by declines for its traditional TV and film businesses though its HBO Max streaming service gained subscribers with buzzy series like "Heated Rivalry".】

item.title: 伯克希尔首席执行官阿贝尔将阐述后巴菲特时代的经营理念
item.description: 伯克希尔·哈撒韦公司新任首席执行官格雷格·阿贝尔作为著名亿万富翁沃伦·巴菲特的继任者，面临诸多挑战。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway's new Chief Executive Greg Abel faces numerous challenges as the successor to famed billionaire Warren Buffett.】

item.title: 英国考虑禁止社交媒体之际，Instagram将向家长发送青少年自杀搜索提醒
item.description: Instagram表示，若青少年在短时间内反复搜索与自杀或自残相关的词条，平台将通知其父母。随着各国政府面临越来越大的压力，要求效仿澳大利亚禁止16岁以下青少年使用社交媒体的政策。【原文：Instagram said it would notify parents if their teenager repeatedly searches for terms related to suicide or self-harm within a short period, as pressure grows for governments to follow Australia's ban on the use of social media for under 16s.】

item.title: 高盛主经纪业务报告称美国软件股将持续反弹
item.description: 高盛主经纪业务部在一份报告中指出，尽管本周对冲基金对软件和IT服务板块的做空规模已达历史最高水平，但该板块近期反弹势头或将延续。【原文：Goldman Sachs prime brokerage said in a note that the recent bounce in software and IT services stocks may continue, even though this week, hedge funds were as short as they have ever been on the sector.】

item.title: Qnity预测全年盈利向好，人工智能热潮推动需求增长
item.description: Qnity Electronics周四预测2026年全年盈利将超出分析师预期，这家新上市的半导体解决方案供应商受益于人工智能、高性能计算及下一代连接技术领域的强劲需求。【原文：Qnity Electronics forecast full-year 2026 earnings above analysts' estimates on Thursday, as the newly listed semiconductor solutions provider benefits from strong demand for artificial intelligence, high‑performance computing and next‑generation connectivity.】

item.title: 挪威主权财富基金运用人工智能筛选ESG风险
item.description: 挪威规模达2.2万亿美元的主权财富基金——全球最大主权财富基金——周四表示，正利用人工智能筛查企业风险，包括潜在的强迫劳动和腐败关联，以避免由此造成的财务损失。【原文：Norway's $2.2 trillion sovereign wealth fund, the world's largest, is using AI to screen companies for risks such as potential links to forced labour and corruption, and help avoid financial losses as a result, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 德国电信首席执行官批评欧盟电信规则改革
item.description: 德国电信首席执行官蒂莫西·赫特格斯对欧盟处理电信行业规则改革的方式表示不满，并呼吁进一步放松管制。【原文：Deutsche Telekom chief executive Timotheus Hoettges expressed dissatisfaction with how the European Union is handling the reform of telecommunication sector rules and called for more deregulation.】

item.title: 美国股市期货震荡，英伟达亮眼财报反响平淡
item.description: 周四美国股指期货走势平淡，英伟达亮眼的季度财报未能获得投资者热烈响应，而软件公司Salesforce的低迷业绩则拖累了市场情绪。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Thursday as Nvidia's stellar quarterly results garnered a lukewarm response from investors and downbeat earnings from software company Salesforce weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 马斯克大力宣传加州无人驾驶出租车，但特斯拉却未采取任何措施获取运营许可
item.description: 过去一年多来，埃隆·马斯克多次表示，特斯拉距离在加州推出无人驾驶机器人出租车服务仅剩数月之遥——前提是州监管机构批准该计划。【原文：For more than a year, Elon Musk has repeatedly said Tesla is months away from launching a driverless robotaxi service in California – once state regulators give their blessing.】

item.title: 美国基金会称中国影响力行动瞄准日本选举、特朗普及其他国家
item.description: 美国一家专注于国家安全和外交政策的研究机构称，在高市早苗于2月赢得日本首相选举前后，数十个与中国虚假信息行动有关联的X平台账号，对她的极端保守观点和对华强硬立场进行了攻击。【原文：In the days surrounding Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's February election win, several dozen X accounts linked to a Chinese misinformation campaign attacked her deeply conservative views and hawkish approach to China, said a U.S. research institute focused on national security and foreign policy.】

item.title: 欧洲央行抛售部分美元资产，降低美元在储备中的比重
item.description: 欧洲央行去年初抛售了部分美元资产，并降低了美元在其外汇储备中的权重，称此举是其投资组合的常规再平衡操作。【原文：The European Central Bank sold some of its dollar assets early last year and reduced the weight of the dollar in its foreign exchange reserves in what it said was a standard rebalancing of its portfolio.】
